code: import{Map}from"immutable";import*as actionTypes from"./constants";var defaultState=Map({listTitle:[],currentIndex:0,playList:{}});function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:defaultState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionTypes.CHANGE_LIST_TITLE:return state.set("listTitle",action.listTitle);case actionTypes.CHANGE_CURRENT_INDEX:return state.set("currentIndex",action.currentIndex);case actionTypes.CHANGE_PLAY_LIST:return state.set("playList",action.playList);default:return state;}}export default reducer;
